trans-unit.source: Add preliminary support for Python 3.9a3+. See issue 124.
trans-unit.target: Add preliminary support for Python 3.9a3+. See issue 124.
PyPy3のサポートを追加しました。

trans-unit.source: Add support for Python 3.7 and drop support for Python 3.3.
trans-unit.target: Python 3.7のサポートを追加し、Python 3.3のサポートを削除。

trans-unit.source: Added explicit support for Python 3.2 and PyPy.
trans-unit.target: Python 3.2 と PyPy の明示的なサポートを追加しました。
Python 3.3のサポートを追加しました。

trans-unit.target: を使用した継続的インテグレーションのサポートを追加しました。

trans-unit.source: Build the CFFI modules (used on PyPy or when PURE_PYTHON is set) at installation or wheel building time when CFFI is available. This replaces the deprecated way of building them at import time. If binary wheels are distributed, it eliminates the need to have a functioning C compiler to use PyPy. See issue 75.
trans-unit.target: Build the CFFI modules (used on PyPy or when PURE_PYTHON is set) at installation or wheel building time when CFFI is available. This replaces the deprecated way of building them at import time. If binary wheels are distributed, it eliminates the need to have a functioning C compiler to use PyPy. See issue 75.

trans-unit.source: C extenstions now build under Python 3.2, passing the same tests as the pure-Python reference implementation.
trans-unit.target: C extenstionsはPython 3.2でビルドするようになり、純粋なPythonリファレンス実装と同じテストを通過するようになりました。

trans-unit.source: Change cPickleCache’s comparison of object sizes to determine whether an object can go in the cache to use
trans-unit.target: Change cPickleCache’s comparison of object sizes to determine whether an object can go in the cache to use
のデフォルト表現を変更します。

trans-unit.source: Change the repr of persistent objects to format the OID as in integer in hexadecimal notation if it is an 8-byte byte string, as ZODB does. This eliminates some issues in doctests. See issue 95.
trans-unit.target: Change the repr of persistent objects to format the OID as in integer in hexadecimal notation if it is an 8-byte byte string, as ZODB does. This eliminates some issues in doctests. See issue 95.

trans-unit.source: Completed pure-Python reference implementations of ‘Persistent’, ‘PickleCache’, and ‘TimeStamp’.
trans-unit.target: Completed pure-Python reference implementations of ‘Persistent’, ‘PickleCache’, and ‘TimeStamp’.
名前が変更された初期化関数の修正
Python 2.6 と 3.2 のサポートを削除。
Python 3.4 のサポートを削除しました。
Python <2.6のサポートを終了しました。

trans-unit.source: Explicitly use unsigned constants for packing and unpacking C timestamps, fixing an arithmetic issue for GCC when optimizations are enabled and
trans-unit.target: C タイムスタンプのパッキングとアンパッキングに符号なし定数を明示的に使用し、最適化が有効な場合の GCC の算術問題を修正。

trans-unit.source: Fix a crash in the test suite under a 32-bit CPython on certain 32-bit platforms. See issue 137. Fix by Jerry James.
trans-unit.target: Fix a crash in the test suite under a 32-bit CPython on certain 32-bit platforms. See issue 137. Fix by Jerry James.

trans-unit.source: Fix an overly specific test failure using zope.interface 5. See issue 144.
trans-unit.target: Fix an overly specific test failure using zope.interface 5. See issue 144.

trans-unit.source: Fix installation of source packages on PyPy. See issue 88.
trans-unit.target: Fix installation of source packages on PyPy. See issue 88.

trans-unit.source: Fix manifest and re-upload to fix stray files included in 4.1.0.
trans-unit.target: マニフェストを修正し、4.1.0に含まれる迷走ファイルを修正するために再アップロード。

trans-unit.source: Fix the Python implementation of the PickleCache to be able to store objects that cannot be weakly referenced. See issue 133.
trans-unit.target: Fix the Python implementation of the PickleCache to be able to store objects that cannot be weakly referenced. See issue 133.

trans-unit.source: Fix the possibility of a rare crash in the C extension when deallocating items. See https://github.com/zopefoundation/persistent/issues/66
trans-unit.target: Fix the possibility of a rare crash in the C extension when deallocating items. See https://github.com/zopefoundation/persistent/issues/66

trans-unit.source: Fix the repr of the persistent objects to include the module name when using the C extension. This matches the pure-Python behaviour and the behaviour prior to 4.4.0. See issue 92.
trans-unit.target: Fix the repr of the persistent objects to include the module name when using the C extension. This matches the pure-Python behaviour and the behaviour prior to 4.4.0. See issue 92.

trans-unit.source: Fix two reference leaks that could theoretically occur as the result of obscure errors. See issue 143.
trans-unit.target: Fix two reference leaks that could theoretically occur as the result of obscure errors. See issue 143.

Python(/PYPY)の実装を修正しました。

trans-unit.source: This package contains a generic persistence implementation for Python. It forms the core protocol for making objects interact “transparently” with a database such as the ZODB.

trans-unit.source: environment variable support: if set, the C extensions will not be built, imported, or tested.
trans-unit.target: 環境変数のサポート:設定されている場合、C 拡張モジュールのビルド、インポート、テストは行われません。

trans-unit.source: environment variable. Now, a value of “0” requires that the C extensions be used; any other non-empty value prevents the extensions from being used. Also, all C extensions are required together or none of them will be used. This prevents strange errors that arise from a mismatch of Python and C implementations. See issue 131.
trans-unit.target: environment variable. Now, a value of “0” requires that the C extensions be used; any other non-empty value prevents the extensions from being used. Also, all C extensions are required together or none of them will be used. This prevents strange errors that arise from a mismatch of Python and C implementations. See issue 131.

trans-unit.source: is called (every transaction boundary) in pure-Python mode (PyPy). This means that the reported size of the cache may be wrong (until the next GC), but it is much faster. This should not have any observable effects for user code.
trans-unit.target: は純粋なPythonモード(PyPy)で(トランザクションの境界ごとに)呼び出されます。これは、報告されたキャッシュのサイズが間違っている可能性があることを意味します(次のGCまで)が、はるかに高速です。これは、ユーザーコードに観察可能な影響を与えることはないはずです。
